entities.description: Public Use File containing person-level analysis weights.
The main person-level analysis weight on the PUF file.
Person-level analysis weight created from additional calibration on the main analytic weight.
Generalized exponential model used for poststratification.
Sampling design variable used for stratification.
Another sampling design variable used for stratification.
Sampling method used to select a random subsample within each stratum.

relationships.description: ANALWT2 was created from additional weight calibration on the main analytic weight ANALWT2_C.
ANALWT2 for 2022 was calibrated based on the web interview mode.
Chromy sampling method uses VERREP for stratification.
Chromy sampling method uses VESTR for stratification.
